description: Now here is some real crushing power, nothing like that puny /b/Millstone/b/.

/b/Cruhsing Wheels/b/ will require /b/Mechanical Crafting/b/ to be made. Place /b/two/b/ of these /6/spinning opposite/6/ of each other to get the crushing going. Depending on the orientation and direction they spin in, items can be pushed though /6/horizontaly/6/, /6/downwards/6/, or /6/upwards/6/ (making use of /b/fans/b/ to push them up).

/b/Cruhsing Wheels/b/ can process any /6/Milling recipe/6/ faster, along with new /6/Crushing recipes/6/. Make sure something is catching the output on the other side, the /c/wheels wont hold on to the result/c/ unless their output is clogged.
